dia.str: I knew you are one of us. Now I can speak freely. I'm a member of the thieves' guild. You have what it takes to be a member. Your heart is at the right place and you don't mind stealing from the rich. Here, take this teleport. It will take you to our base. Speak to Gail. She will help you in your quest. One more thing. Don't speak about the children. Only I know about their hiding place. If the guild finds out about them they would train them to be thieves.
Your secret is safe with me, Morven. Thank you.
